item.description:
I've made small changes to this Meetup. Now you can sign up directly instead of signing up for the waiting list. Please update your 'yes' RSVP after you purchase a ticket. Also, please indicate whether you will be at dinner before the show.

--------------------------------------------------------

Come see the hit Musical 'Hair'.

"Direct from the Public Theater and Broadway, the Tony Award-winning revival of Hair comes to the Colonial Theatre in Boston as part of its national tour. Featuring such songs as "Aquarius," "Let the Sun Shine In" and "Good Morning, Starshine," Hair is about a group of young Americans who speak up and sing out in a celebration of love, life, peace and freedom in turbulent times." (goldstar)

 

Cost: $57, follow http://www.goldstar.com/groups/c35d0b2fb45135426e9ab5f99e120aebc839a069 to purchase through Goldstar and be seated with the group.  Tickets will be held at the door and are available starting at 6:00 the day of the show

 Meeting time & place:  Pick up your Will Call Tickets no later than 7:30 and meet the group at the door closest to the section of the theater where the seats are. We will head over to our seats at 7:45.

Pre-show dinner: Meet at the food court inside the transportation building/City Place at 6:30. If possible, pick up your tickets at the theater prior to dinner. http://www.cityplaceboston.com/
item.how_to_find_us: pre-show dinner meet in the food court of the transportation building; at the theater in front of the doors leading to our section. I will have a Meetup sign with me at both locations
